desc: My Project entails improving QR Codes data storage capacity. This is be done by separating data into 3 equal segments and then encoding as 3  QR codes. The white sections of the QR codes are then colored Red, Green and Blue respectively, they are then algebraically added on top of each other in Matlab to produce the combined QR Code that displayed below in Diagram 1. this will allow for the one image to hold up to 3 times as much data as a conventional QR code by simply involving color as an added element.What i need is a simple android application to be built that will use the camera to capture an image, separate the image into red, green and blue components, and then read each image for a QR Code. The data from the QR Codes is to be displayed in succession on the mobile device as 1 sentence or paragraph.
title: Coloured QR Code Reader

desc: I have a contracting business in Australia, I used to have a an app that was just about okay but is nl longer on the App Store.3 months ago I posted on here the same request and awarded the job to company that were unable to complete the job after being paid, they completed 80% of the job and I was in the start happy with progress.I have some of that source code and links to the original app.Pleas not if you bid on this job YOU WILL NOT BE PAID IN FULL UNTIL THE JOB IS FINISHED.Do not ask for more money after you have bid for the Job, do not ask for rewards, I am not interested in working with people who cannot do the job they bid for.I need an app that can work on iPad, iPhone, it will never be on the App Store. you will need a developer account, if you do not have one do not bid.it is basically an app that collects data of electrical tests and at the end f a job of around 200-900 items tested it will generate a PDF report, if an item fails it will be reported at the top of the report with a photo.A csv option is also available.the fields we need to collect data for need to sync across all users, either on a DB on iCloud or on my server.I have screen shots of the original no longer app, and the almost complete source code from the last freelancer.I am very reasonable to deal with if you are professional, on completion of this app I will be posting another 3 to be built for similar reporting.I need to know you have read this before bid, so please open your bid with " I have read what your need for this app"if this is not in the first line of your bid it will be ignored.Thanks and have a great day.
title: Mobile App for Private use

desc: 1.1	ProductOur Software is an Android Mobile application that displays the user favorite news’ and events’ websites based on his location which the application will detect automatically. In Addition, a web based backend to add more news and events websites.1.2	ScopeOur mobile application will detect the user location through GPS and display the news and the events due to the current location automatically. All the feed from the news and events websites is Rich Site Summary (RSS) feed. So, all the news will be updated automatically from the news website itself.  Finally, The System will contain a backend that should help the system administrator to add more news and events feed source to the application database.1.3	Business GoalsOur project is a mobile application for public service because we are providing a simpler way to get the news and the events based on your current location. The application also is getting the feed from other resources which are not part of our company.  So, businesswise our application cannot be sold commercial (cost to download). Therefore, our business goals will concentrate on advertisement.•	Advertisements can be shown within the App•	The application is detecting your location to get the news feed. We can use the same concept to display Ads based on location•	The idea of the application is important for a large number of users. Therefore, it will attract many companies to advertise with us.
title: InFormit-Localized News and Event Portal - open to bidding
